sentences.en: After much cogitation, we decided to move to the Isle of Wight.
sentences.cn: 经过慎重考虑后，我们决定搬到怀特岛去。

sentences.en: Bill for route between Isle of Dogs and Stratford submitted.
sentences.cn: 连接狗岛和斯杰福的线路图得以签署.

sentences.en: Castle-hunters won't be disappointed with the Isle of Man.
sentences.cn: 马恩岛不会让城堡探寻者失望的。

sentences.en: He is from the Isle of Man in the Irish Sea.
sentences.cn: 他来自爱尔兰海的马恩岛.

sentences.en: I saw you two just now in the isle pavilion. "
sentences.cn: 我还看见你在湖心亭里跟倩儿说话. ”

sentences.en: In a word, the isle was inhabited.
sentences.cn: 总而言之, 这个小岛上确是有居民的.

sentences.en: In the Isle of Wight, if it's not too dear.
sentences.cn: 在怀特岛上, 只要不是太贵.

sentences.en: KJV Pass ye over to Tarshish; howl , ye inhabitants of the isle.
sentences.cn: [新译]你们要过到他施去; 沿海的居民哪, 要哀号!

sentences.en: Richard Bilton , BBC News, on the Isle of Mull.
sentences.cn: 英国广播公司新闻,RichardBilton, 穆尔岛报道.

sentences.en: She sought the advice of their old friend from Isle of Wight days , John Stebbings.
sentences.cn: 她征求了在怀特岛时认识的老朋友约翰·斯特宾斯的意见.

sentences.en: She was brought up in Fair Isle, and wanted to return home.
sentences.cn: 她很小的时候就来到赛尔岛, 现在她想回家了.

sentences.en: The boat left for the paradise isle of Bali.
sentences.cn: 小船驶向天堂一般的巴厘岛。

sentences.en: Their nine - day - long honeymoon was on the isle of Capri.
sentences.cn: 他们九天的蜜月在意大利卡普里岛渡过.

sentences.en: This isle was then floating and unstable.
sentences.cn: 这座小岛漂浮在水面上并且不稳定.

phrases.tran_cn: 英国属地曼岛（首都道格拉斯，位于欧洲）

trans.tran_en: a word for an island, used in poetry or in names of islands
